message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm hoping we can still negotiate
Okay, Alice, let's be fair. A 50/50 split is the most logical solution.  Time is running out!
Your 50/50 split is fair, but considering the inflation, I think I deserve a bit more
Alice, I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage. Let's settle this now with a slight advantage to you, before it gets any worse for me.
I know the inflation is affecting you, but I'm trying to maximize my gain. This is a serious offer, consider it carefully
Alice, I'm serious about getting this done. I'm willing to accept a lower share to avoid losing everything to inflation. This is my final offer.
